OAuth


OAuth support (pac4j-oauth module)

Use the following clients to login with their corresponding identity providers:

BitBucket - CAS server using OAuth protocol - DropBox - Facebook - Foursquare - Github - Google - LinkedIn - Odnoklassniki - ORCiD - Paypal - Strava - Twitter - Vk - Windows Live - Word Press - Yahoo
